Product.title: Our Products
Product.subtitle: Explore our suite of developer tools designed to boost your productivity and streamline your workflow.
Product.developerFocusedDesc: Every tool is built with developers in mind, prioritizing efficiency and ease of use.
Product.regularUpdatesDesc: We continuously improve our products based on user feedback and emerging technologies.
Product.documentationDesc: Comprehensive guides and tutorials to help you get started quickly.
Product.supportDesc: Dedicated support to help you with any questions or issues.
Product.vsCodeDesc: A powerful extension to enhance your coding workflow in Visual Studio Code
Product.nextjsDesc: Modern web applications built with cutting-edge Next.js technology
Product.pythonDesc: Automation scripts and AI-powered solutions using Python

Home.title: Build better with
Home.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of developer tools and solutions focused on VS Code extensions, Next.js web applications, and Python automation.
Home.ctaDescription: Explore our tools and solutions designed to make your development experience more productive and enjoyable.
Home.vsCodeExtensionDesc: Boost your productivity with our powerful VS Code extension
Home.nextjsToolsDesc: Modern web applications with cutting-edge Next.js frameworks
Home.pythonSolutionsDesc: Automation, data analysis, and AI-powered Python scripts

About.title: About dotsuite
About.subtitle: We are passionate developers creating tools to help you build better software, faster.
About.missionDesc1: At dotsuite, we believe that great developer tools should be accessible, reliable, and enjoyable to use.
About.missionDesc2: Whether you are working on VS Code extensions, building Next.js applications, or automating tasks with Python, we are here to help you succeed.
About.whatWeDo1: Build VS Code extensions to enhance productivity
About.whatWeDo2: Create modern web applications with Next.js
About.timeline1Desc: Started building developer tools focused on productivity
About.timeline2Desc: Released our first extension with 1000+ users
About.workTogetherDesc: We are always looking for new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out!
